abstract: Jordan Spieth defeats Mikko Ilonen in first-round of Match Play Championship round-robin tournament.
lead_paragraph: Spieth made six birdies and closed out Mikko Ilonen on the 16th hole at the Match Play Championship in San Francisco, getting off to a good start at the round-robin tournament.

headline.main: Jordan Spieth Wins His Opening Match in San Francisco
headline.print_headline: Spieth Wins His Opening Match in San Francisco

snippet: Spieth made six birdies and closed out Mikko Ilonen on the 16th hole at the Match Play Championship in San Francisco, getting off to a good start at the round-robin tournament.
